Articles.Content:
> 
> Told you it is not today. Close steam, stop refreshing and go home.

\*kicks out the back of the train\*
Will it not release at 6PM (or is it 5PM) UK Time when Steam updates their games?
Just woke up, going to work - will be #MOREHYPE ing from there!
KSP Official twitter is online: They just retweeted something
9 minutes on kerbalx!

> 
> \*kicks out the back of the train\*

\*kicks out the front of the train\* more like.

> 
> Remember the good ol' days?
> 
> 
> 
> <iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/0xgeQf19GYA?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
> 
> I've been playing since 0.14, and KSP has come so *far* since then! It's almost unbelievable to go back to the old versions and see what was missing.
> 
> ...Thanks for sticking with this game, SQUAD. Your 325?-page thread means that there's a lot of people who appreciate your efforts.
> 
> (oh, and am I the only person here who isn't spam-posting? That's rather a shame...)
> 
> -Upsilon

This guy sounds just like me!!

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-27T14:57:00Z" title="04/27/2015 02:57  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 27, 2015</time> by Red Iron Crown**
  
Mind your language, please.

My tummy is excited even!

![:confused:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_huh.gif) :confused: ![:confused:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_huh.gif) :confused: ![:confused:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_huh.gif) :confused: ![:confused:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_huh.gif) :confused: ![:confused:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_huh.gif)
Are we there yet?

> 
> \*kicks out the front of the train\* more like.

That's harsh...

> 
> How am I supposed to celebrate without a machete???

Have a snickers? Works for Danny Trejo. Turned him right into Marsha.
What will be of the Hype Train once 1.0 is release? Will it forever break free of Kerbol's gravity and return for 1.1?
We need the 1812 overture playing.
I'm posting again. Posting because of the hype.

> 
> Are we there yet?

approaching, better F5 for safety
Then I will join you on this train, to infinity!!! and belonged!

> 
> We need the 1812 overture playing.

Or Ride of the Valkyries.

> 
> What will be of the Hype Train once 1.0 is release? Will it forever break free of Kerbol's gravity and return for 1.1?

It's better not to think about it...
I'm adding my coal to the train! I don't think i have enough!!
come onnn

> 
> Remember the good ol' days?
> 
> 
> 
> <iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/0xgeQf19GYA?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
> 
> I've been playing since 0.14, and KSP has come so *far* since then! It's almost unbelievable to go back to the old versions and see what was missing.
> 
> ...Thanks for sticking with this game, SQUAD. Your 325?-page thread means that there's a lot of people who appreciate your efforts.
> 
> (oh, and am I the only person here who isn't spam-posting? That's rather a shame...)
> 
> -Upsilon

Thanks, you gave me something to watch for about... three pages of hype?

Rune. That's just under one page a minute. Hum, I though that would be more.

> 
> That's harsh...

Yeah, we don't wanna do that, Gregrox won't be able to see!

> 
> We need the 1812 overture playing.

<iframe width="459" height="344" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/u2W1Wi2U9sQ?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Here you go!
The Hype made me do it.
more hype we need the hype.
